verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. The YY <WH3068> hear <WH6030> <WH8799> thee in the day <WH3117> of trouble <WH6869>; the name <WH8034> of the 'Elohim <WH430> of Ya`akov <WH3290> defend <WH7682> <WH8762> thee;
Send <WH7971> <WH8799> thee help <WH5828> from the sanctuary <WH6944>, and strengthen <WH5582> <WH8799> thee out of TZiyon <WH6726>;
Remember <WH2142> <WH8799> all thy offerings <WH4503>, and accept <WH1878> <WH8762> thy burnt sacrifice <WH5930>; Selah <WH5542>.
Grant <WH5414> <WH8799> thee according to thine own heart <WH3824>, and fulfil <WH4390> <WH8762> all thy counsel <WH6098>.

We will rejoice <WH7442> <WH8762> in thy salvation <WH3444>, and in the name <WH8034> of our 'Elohim <WH430> we will set up our banners <WH1713> <WH8799>: the YY <WH3068> fulfil <WH4390> <WH8762> all thy petitions <WH4862>.

Now know <WH3045> <WH8804> I that the YY <WH3068> saveth <WH3467> <WH8689> his anointed <WH4899>; he will hear <WH6030> <WH8799> him from his holy <WH6944> heaven <WH8064> with the saving <WH3468> strength <WH1369> of his right hand <WH3225>.
Some trust in chariots <WH7393>, and some in horses <WH5483>: but we will remember <WH2142> <WH8686> the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> our 'Elohim <WH430>.
They are brought down <WH3766> <WH8804> and fallen <WH5307> <WH8804>: but we are risen <WH6965> <WH8804>, and stand upright <WH5749> <WH8696>.
Save <WH3467> <WH8685>, YY <WH3068>: let the king <WH4428> hear <WH6030> <WH8799> us when <WH3117> we call <WH7121> <WH8800>.
